Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Mast cells appeared in the connective and muscular layers of the bladder at a much higher number in DBA / 2 mice than in C57BL / 6 mice or untreated controls .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| DBA / 2 mice |

In this paragraph, "DBA / 2 mice" is the entity referred to as having a higher number of mast cells in their connective and muscular layers of the bladder. This is considered a disease state or condition, as mast cell infiltration is not typically observed at such high levels in C57BL / 6 mice or untreated controls.
